import React from "react"; import { Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Col } from "reactstrap"; import axios from "../Utils/axios"; class PostFormOfBook extends React.Component { state = { name: "", quantity: 0, location: "", description: "", isbn: "", publisher: "", author: "" }; handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); console.log(this.state); }; handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const book = { name: this.state.name, quantity: this.state.quantity, location: this.state.location, description: this.state.description, isbn: this.state.isbn, publisher: this.state.publisher, author: this.state.author }; axios({ method: "post", url: "/book", data: book, }) .then(res => { console.log(res) /*this.props.history.push("/");*/ }) .catch(error => { console.log(error.response.data); {error.response.data.detail.map ((res, index) => ( console.log(index, res) ))} }); }; render() { return (

NEW BOOK FORM

); } } export default PostFormOfBook;
